name: Farmageddon (itch) (Draekdude, alexepton)
description:
This project was made with purchased assets for the GoedWare Game Jam. https://itch.io/jam/goedware-game-jam-7

The theme was "Alternate Reality | Time is Power"

In this alternate dimension farmers harvest their crops with weapons and the vegetables attack! 
Controls:
Keyboard WASD for moving, E to switch weapons, Space to jump
Mouse - Left click to Attack and Right Click to Aim
Controller - Left stick for moving, Right Stick for camera/aim, Left Trigger to aim, right Trigger to shoot, Right bumper to change weapons and South Button to jump

Weapons: Pitchfork, Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun and Bazooka

At the end of each Wave you can purchase more ammo.
